name: Contra: Spirit of War Redux
description:
Contra: Spirit of War Redux is a fan game based on the Konami Contra series with 8-bit graphics and gameplay features typical of the later games in the series, such as smart bombs, the ability to carry two weapons, move on hanging rails, and more.

A new danger threatens the Earth. The private military company "Blue Hornet" plans to establish a new world order with the help of a powerful artifact received from an alien patron. At the same time, the aliens planned a new invasion with the Blue Hornet. Bill Raiser and Lance Bean must stop them and capture the artifact.

Game features:

- 12 action packed levels of four different gameplay types;

- A powerful arsenal including more 10 different guns and their upgraded versions;

- Password system and Konami code;

- Unlockable Boss Rush mode and new heroes. 

Notice: this game is a free non-profit fangame, created just for fun. Contra series is property of Konami; all used resources, characters, trademarks etc. belong to their respective owners.
